Class Ogre

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.GameElement

  • public class Ogre
extends GameElement
    Ogre.java - class that handles all the ogre logic .
    Author:
    Joao Fidalgo & Francisco Friande
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getRandMove

        public java.lang.String getRandMove()
        gets a number from 0 (included) to 3 (included) and sends it to ogreMoves function.
        Returns:
        what ogresMoves returns.

      • getClub_coord

        public int[] getClub_coord()
        Returns:

      • setClub_coord

        public void setClub_coord(int[] club)
        Sets the coords of ogre's club.
        Parameters:
        club-A - variable of type Int[][].coords to set as coords of club.

      • stunHandler

        public boolean stunHandler()
        Handles the stun of the ogre, number of rounds.

        If the number of rounds has reached the limit , or if it is not stunned returns false.

        Returns:
        true if it is stunned, false otherwise.

      • isStunned

        public boolean isStunned()
        Returns:
        stunned- if the ogre is stunned

        Parameters:

      • moveOgre

        public void moveOgre(Game g,
                     int i)
        handles all the conditions and the movement of ogre.

        Stays for 20 times in a loop that tries to move the ogre to a valid position.

        Parameters:
        g-A - variable of type Game.
        i-A - variable of type Int.

      • moveIT

        public void moveIT(Game g,
                   int[] aux,
                   int i)
        Parameters:
        g - - A variable of type Game.
        aux - - A variable of type Int[].
        i - -A variable of type Int. Handles the rest of move of ogre and club.

        Checks all the contions in map.

      • swingClub

        public void swingClub(Game g)
        handles all the conditions and the movement of club.

        Stays for 20 times in a loop that tries to move the club to a valid position.

        Parameters:
        g-A - variable of type Game.

      • deleteClub

        public void deleteClub(Game g)
        Delets club from the map. Sets its coords to -1,-1 to set it out of the map.
        Parameters:
        g-A - variable of type Game.

      • stunOgre

        public void stunOgre(Game g,
                     int i)
        Sets the ogre as stunned and changes the element in map.
        Parameters:
        g-A - variable of type Game.
        i-A - variable of type Int. Index of the ogre in the game array of ogres.
